translation: And in the heaven is your provision and whatever you are promised.
And there is no creature on earth except that its provision is from Allah.
And whoever fears Allah – He will make for him a way out.
And will provide for him from where he does not expect.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond what it can bear.
Put your trust in Allah. Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
If Allah were to expand the provision for His servants, they would transgress.
How many creatures carry not their own provision! Allah provides for them and for you.
When the prayer is finished, disperse through the land and seek the bounty of Allah.
O you who believe! Eat from the good things We have provided for you.
If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
It is He who made the earth manageable for you, so walk through its pathways and eat of His provision.
The good and the evil are not equal, even though the abundance of evil may impress you.
Whoever does righteousness… We will give them a good life.
Whatever blessing you have is from Allah.
Prepare against them whatever you are able of power.
And those who strive for Us – We will surely guide them to Our ways.
My Lord, cause me to enter with a truthful entrance and exit.
Do not despair of the mercy of Allah.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Remember Me; I will remember you.
To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth.
Do not lose heart nor fall into despair; you will be superior if you are believers.
Allah provides for whom He wills without measure.
You honor whom You will, and You humble whom You will.
For men is a share of what they earn, and for women is a share of what they earn.
Whatever good befalls you is from Allah; whatever evil befalls you is from yourself.
Be just; that is nearer to righteousness.
If only the people of the towns had believed and feared Allah, We would have opened for them blessings from the heavens and the earth.
We have certainly established you on the earth and made for you therein livelihoods.
In the bounty of Allah and His mercy – let them rejoice.
Seek forgiveness of your Lord… He will increase you in strength.
Seek forgiveness… He will send rain in abundance and add strength to your strength.
Those who believe and do righteous deeds will be admitted to gardens beneath which rivers flow.
There is not a thing but its treasures are with Us.
He sends down rain from the sky; from it is drink and from it grows vegetation.
We have honored the children of Adam.
Whoever desires the Hereafter and strives for it… their striving is appreciated.
Allah increases in guidance those who are guided.
Command your family to pray… We provide for you.
They used to hasten to good deeds and call upon Us in hope and fear.
Those who migrate in the cause of Allah… We will surely provide for them a good provision.
We do not burden a soul beyond its capacity.
That Allah may reward them for the best of what they did and increase them from His bounty.
They are those who are balanced in their spending.
Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts it.
Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heaven and the earth?
Those who recite the Book of Allah… expect a trade that will never perish.
Is Allah not sufficient for His servant?
Allah is Gentle with His servants; He gives provision to whom He wills.
